title: Did George Soros Pay Refugees in Honduras to Join a Caravan and Storm the US Border?
subtitle: A baseless, fear-mongering and factually inaccurate tweet claiming that a group of refugees in Honduras were paid by George Soros to storm the border was posted by a United States Congressman in October 2018.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: A video shows a group of people in Honduras being paid by George Soros to join a migrant caravan and storm the United States border.
